name: Glazed Apple Cookies
author: Sandy Moore
summary: Spicy cookies that everyone loves.  I've mailed them before and they mail beautifully.  I've been making these for about 25 years, and never met anyone yet who didn't like them.
ingredients: 1 cup apples - peeled, cored and finely diced
directions: Beat shortening and brown sugar together until light and fluffy
Beat in egg and blend thoroughly
Stir together flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, cloves and nutmeg
Stir half the dry ingredients into creamed mixture
Stir in nuts, apple and raisins, then stir in remaining half of dry ingredients and milk
Drop from tablespoon 1 1/2 inches apart onto lightly greased baking sheet
Bake in a preheated 400 degree oven for 10-12 minutes
Remove cookies to racks and while still warm, spread with glaze
To make Glaze:  Combine powdered sugar, butter, vanilla and enough cream to make glaze of spreading consistency
